_source.text: According to this 2005 article in the Taipei Times (yes, I did some Googling), William Safire traces the word back to 1929, when the New York Times wrote, "When a batter produces a safe 'blow' at an opportune moment, his fellow players say that he has hit 'in the saddle' or 'in the clutch.' " Somehow that morphed into "clutch," which sounds 10 times better than "saddle."

text: According to this 2005 article in the Taipei Times (yes, I did some Googling), William Safire traces the word back to 1929, when the New York Times wrote, "When a batter produces a safe 'blow' at an opportune moment, his fellow players say that he has hit 'in **the** **saddle**' or 'in the clutch.' " Somehow that morphed into "clutch," which sounds 10 times **better** **than** "saddle."

_source.text: After getting into "Sweet Tooth" I sought after the Saddle Tramp/I'm A Man record....To this day, the original version of Saddle Tramp is MUCH better than the Supersuckers cover.

text: After getting into "Sweet Tooth" I sought after **the** **Saddle** Tramp/I'm A Man record....To this day
, the original version of Saddle Tramp is MUCH **better** **than** the Supersuckers cover.

_source.text: 32 yrs in the saddle and having owned several BMWs and Kawis...my general experience has been the you are more likely to see BMWs with high milage that Kawis...BMW shops tend to be a little better than Kaw, but more expensive.

you are more likely to see BMWs with high milage that Kawis...BMW shops tend to be a little **better** **than** Kaw, but more expensive.

text: 2. The brake hood and brake lever fit the contour of most medium and large-size hands **better** **than** Ergo's while standing and sprinting or climbing out of **the** **saddle**.

_source.text: 8 hours in the saddle is better than 12 hours in the saddle because its not your legs that hut, but your neck and wrists and arse.

text: 8 hours in **the** **saddle** **is** **better** **than** 12 hours in **the** **saddle** because its not your legs that hut, but your neck and wrists and arse.
